channel.title: Black mesa and Monster hunter world
channel.description: Black mesa reminds me monster hunter world First Gonarch has Deviljho's pain(or attack) scream while it charges Comparison: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gXIZARSTWYM 2:41 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CwIdppMVCnA 1:16 And the Xen wildlife and ecology is great Any xenian creatures has different behavior. They looks like a real creature in real life. Would Black mesa/half life series has a crossover with MHW? (Just joking)
